data.text:
Kristine Hermosa is a Filipina actress, model, and former beauty queen. She first rose to fame in the early 2000s as part of the teen-oriented show âGimikâ and has since then become a household name in the Philippine entertainment industry. While Kristine has been in the limelight for over two decades, her romantic life has also been of great interest to her fans. In this article, we will take a closer look at who Kristine Hermosa is dating now, her past relationships, current relationship status, and any rumours surrounding her love life.

Past Relationships:

Kristine Hermosaâs romantic history dates back to her teenage years. She was previously in a relationship with actor Diether Ocampo, who she met while working on the set of their TV series âSanaây Wala Nang Wakasâ in 2003. The two became one of the most popular love teams of their generation and were even dubbed as âKrisTher.â However, their relationship ended in 2008.

After her breakup with Diether, Kristine started dating actor and model Oyo Boy Sotto. The two got married in January 2011 and have four children together.

Current Relationship Status:

As of writing, Kristine Hermosa is still happily married to Oyo Boy Sotto. The couple has been together for more than a decade and their marriage has been described as one of the most enduring relationships in Philippine showbiz.

Rumours:

Despite being happily married, Kristine Hermosa has been the subject of various rumours regarding her love life. In 2019, there were speculations that she and her former on-screen partner Jericho Rosales had rekindled their romance. However, both Kristine and Jericho denied the rumours and clarified that they are just good friends.

Breakup:

Kristine Hermosaâs most publicized breakup was with Diether Ocampo. The two were together for five years before their relationship came to an end in 2008. While the reason for their split was never revealed, many speculated that their busy schedules and individual career aspirations were the main factors.

Facts:

Kristine Hermosa was born on September 9, 1983, in Quezon City, Philippines.

She started her career as a child actress and appeared in various TV commercials before landing her breakout role in âGimik.â

In addition to her acting career, Kristine is also a successful model and beauty queen. She was crowned Binibining Pilipinas-World in 2000 and represented the Philippines in the Miss World pageant the same year.

Kristine is also known for her philanthropic work and has been involved in various charity organizations, including the Philippine Red Cross.
